summary: Senior Director, Product Management with twenty years of experience in product management, product marketing, and business development across startups and publicly traded companies. Focused on customer business needs, with a deep online media background, and a passion for planning and building enabling technologies in streaming video, distribution, consumption, and monetization. Adept at leveraging data to drive opportunities, improve KPIs, and ship high-quality software on time.

experience.title: Senior Director, Product Management
experience.description: Led a team of product managers, designers, and QA testers. Managed, designed, and released the first mobile-responsive version of the product. Conducted extensive user testing across iterations. Analyzed key performance indicators to drive new opportunities and identify product problems.

experience.title: VP, Digital Media Solutions
experience.description: Developed and executed a strategic vision delivering solutions for media companies across verticals; created media segmentation, target market definitions, and core messaging; built industry-specific solutions blending partner technologies, Brightcove services, and core product for mobile advertising, live ad insertion, and connected TV apps. Collaborated with CTO and VP of Product to prioritize features; supported sales with pitches; consulted with customers to improve practices; managed event presence and authored thought leadership.

experience.title: Director, Technology Partnerships
experience.description: Created and managed Brightcove's Technology Partner program (over 200 participants across more than a dozen categories); recruited partners; developed legal, business, and technical framework; negotiated strategic deals; implemented partner onboarding and management processes; integrated partners into customer accounts to address business needs.

experience.title: Director, Ad Products
experience.description: Led advertising features for the video platform, conducted customer visits and usability studies, introduced Scrum to development, collaborated across functions, and built technical partnerships with key ad industry players; co-authored the IAB's Digital Video Overview and VAST specs; built a network of publishers and managed ad inventory and payments.

experience.title: Vice President, Product
experience.description: Ran the product team, developed brand identity, conducted many customer interviews to identify features, worked with a small development team to deliver products, and implemented process changes to improve manual labor efficiency by over 300%.

experience.title: Director of Products
experience.description: Defined product direction, wrote specifications, set development priorities, and led development teams. Brought Viewpoint's first SaaS product for rich media advertising; created templates; managed a team of 20+; integrated Unicast assets post-acquisition; migrated from waterfall to Scrum; maintained partner relationships with AOL, Adobe, and DoubleClick.

experience.title: Director, Product Marketing
experience.description: Managed product marketing responsibilities including product definition, value proposition, pricing, lead generation, events, communications, and PR. Led a team of seven with a $5M budget. Developed Viewpoint's first suite of advertising products and campaigns; managed AOL and client relationships; delivered marketing solutions for major clients.

experience.title: Product Manager
experience.description: Designed and implemented strategy for a mature product, performed pricing changes, built partnerships, created demos, and produced marketing communications. Worked with R&D to prioritize features and drive releases; coordinated cross-department efforts for major releases; engaged with key partners.

experience.title: Director, 3D Products
experience.description: Helped build one of the first professional Mac- and Windows-based 3D modeling, animation, and rendering systems; contributed to teams and processes for support, QA, PM, product marketing, and marketing communications; helped grow the company to ~40 people and $12M in revenue before acquisition.

education.degree: Bachelor of Arts in Behavioral Sciences
Coursework toward a degree in International Affairs
Concentration in Computer Science and Computer Graphics and Animation
